name: Sleep Deeper WebGL
description:
ludum dare 48 theme:deeper and deeper

use FULLSCREEN for better experience

keep workding or get some sleep? how deep can you sleep? try to keep enough food storage get some good pillow to sleep a teddy bear would help a lot :)!

#game info

when you fall asleep, the desire of things you don’t have enough will force you wake up, try buy more stuff to sleep deeper :)

drink and food can buy 5 times a day and will be cleaned up when you wake up

pillow and teddybear can only get one by each, but you can upgrade them when you buy them again!

#credit
